verbs.description: [V: s] [ARG1: a middle school building renamed for late teacher] the memory of a beloved teacher who died in an accident while traveling in uganda over the summer will live on at rhodes middle school thanks to the work of the many people whose lives he touched during his 23-year teaching career san antonio independent school district board members voted unanimously this week to rename the technology building in honor of the late william e davis the board decision will help keep the spirit of davis middle school s a middle school william e davis rhodes middle school middle school william e technology building san antonio independent school district uganda william e technology building william e davis
